CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 1, 1956, pg. 20, reads: "Ammon Aqua Show - Pictured are some of the participants in Aqua Show held at Ammon Pool. Far right: Members of the Cha Cha team are Sidney Wilson, Jean Wilds, Donald McCreary, Alberta Thompson, Carmen Wilson and John Sullivan. - Harris Photo."The song for this dance number might be Tito Puente's Mambo.
TitMainTitle: Cha cha team wearing dark Bermuda shorts and long light colored socks, from left: Sidney Wilson, Jean Wilds, Donald "Satch" McCreary, Alberta Thompson, Carmen Wilson, and John "Johnnycake" Sullivan, posed with raised knees, at Ammon Recreation Center Pool, with onlookers in background including Mary Ellen Johnson on left, and Louise Grace fourth from left
